newsitem.title: FRANCE: SCI says planning to sell Sucre et Denrees stake.
newsitem.headline: SCI says planning to sell Sucre et Denrees stake.

text.p: Societe Centrale d'Investissements (SCI) said on Friday it was negotiating the sale of its 30.4 percent stake in Compagnie Financiere Sucre et Denrees to the management of Sucre et Denrees.
"Societe Centrale d'Investissements is in negotiation for the sale of its 30.4 percent stake in Compagnie Financiere Sucre et Denrees," a company official told Reuters.
He said SCI had received an offer from "certain managers" of the company and was hoping to reach a deal by the end of the year.
Compagnie Financiere Sucre et Denrees is the holding company of French sugar trade firm Sucden Kerry.
